title: Strictly's Saffron Barker admits crippling back pain has left her struggling to SLEEP
text:
Strictly Come Dancing star Saffron Barker has cast doubt over her performance this weekend, after injuring her back during her dance with AJ Pritchard last week.

Taking to Instagram Stories on Tuesday, the YouTube star, 20, shared a candid post admitting that she was struggling to get through training, before later sharing with fans that the pain has even stopped her from sleeping.

Saffron is set to take to the floor this weekend to dance a Foxtrot to the Frank Sinatra classic New York, New York, after earning strong scores for her Contemporary dance last week.

Scroll down for video

Ouch! Strictly Come Dancing star Saffron Barker has cast doubt over her performance this weekend, as she struggles with back pain during training

In a video during training Saffron wrote: 'I'm actually in so much pain. I really hurt my back on Saturday. We actually can't get through today. We can't do it.'

Ever the supportive partner, AJ insisted that they would soldier on, saying: 'No, it's going well. It's just that we have to do specific points. There's a lot of cane work in there which is amazing but we are just being sensible.'

And after attending the Best Hero awards that evening, Saffron posted a snap to her Instagram stories at 1am with the caption: 'The pain in my back is just keeping me up all night.'

Candid: The YouTube star posed a video on Instagram Stories revealing that she was struggling to train for her Foxtrot

Supportive: AJ insisted that they would soldier on, and said that they were being 'sensible' to avoid any further injuries

Agonising: And after attending the Best Hero awards that evening, Saffron posted a snap to her Instagram stories at 1am hinting that her back pain was yet to go away

Saffron had previously admitted that rehearsals for her contemporary performances with AJ had left her covered in bruises.

Speaking on It Takes Two she said: 'I am covered in bruises, yes, this is the first time we've done lifts together. It is difficult and a lot of pain!'

But the hard work paid off as the pair earned a solid 33 points out of 40 for their dance, which Saffron dedicated to her grandmother who was watching on in the audience.

Lovely: On Saturday Saffron and AJ danced a Couples Choice: Contemporary to her grandmother's favourite song Because You Loved Me by Celine Dion

After the dance Saffron warmed viewers' hearts when she ran into the audience to embrace her nan, having performed to her favourite song Because You Loved Me by Celine Dion.

This weekend the dancing duo will head back to the ballroom for their foxtrot to the big band classic New York New York.

So far Saffron and AJ have impressed with their consistently strong performances, but Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse are currently the odds-on favourites to win the show.

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Saturday at 6:40pm on BBC One.
description: The YouTube star, 20, shared a candid post on Tuesday admitting that she was struggling to get through training, before later sharing with fans that the pain has even stopped her from sleeping.
